sourcesContent:
Edit application

Apply

Why do you need this?
import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Application } from '../model/application.model'; import { Technology } from '../model/technology.model'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent implements OnInit { @Input("application") application: Application | null = null; @Input("technologies") technologies: Array = []; applicationForm = this.fb.group({ description: [""], email: [""], neededTill: [""], newTechnology: new FormControl(false), technology: new FormGroup({ type: new FormControl(''), ram: new FormControl(4), cores: new FormControl(1), motherboard: new FormControl(''), gpu: new FormControl(''), }), }); constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) {} ngOnInit(): void { console.log(this.application) // This means that we are editing an application if (this.application) { this.applicationForm.patchValue({ description: this.application.description, email: this.application.email, neededTill: this.application.neededTill, newTechnology: this.application.technology ? true : false, technology: { type: this.application.technology?.type, ram: this.application.technology?.ram, cores: this.application.technology?.cores, motherboard: this.application.technology?.motherboard, gpu: this.application.technology?.gpu, } }); // this.applicationForm.controls["description"].setValue(this.application.description); // this.applicationForm.controls["email"].setValue(this.application.email); // this.applicationForm.controls["neededTill"].setValue(this.application.neededTill); // if (this.application.technology) { // this.applicationForm.controls["newTechnology"].setValue(true); // this.technologyForm.controls["type"].setValue(this.application.technology.type); // this.technologyForm.controls["ram"].setValue(this.application.technology.ram); // this.technologyForm.controls["cores"].setValue(this.application.technology.cores); // this.technologyForm.controls["motherboard"].setValue(this.application.technology.motherboard); // this.technologyForm.controls["gpu"].setValue(this.application.technology.gpu); // } } } }
